triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: The paper reviews collaborative communication and control strategies for unmanned aerial vehicles used in military, civil, and commercial applications.

triples.name: Communications system
triples.relevance: High-speed communication links are a primary focus for enabling autonomous coordination and collaboration in multi-UAV swarms.

triples.name: Control system
triples.relevance: Flexible control strategies are essential for managing the autonomy and reliability of collaborative UAV systems.

triples.name: Swarm robotics
triples.relevance: The paper comprehensively reviews UAV swarm networks and swarm-based collaboration for coordinated multi-agent systems.

triples.name: Autonomous system
triples.relevance: Autonomous collaboration and autonomous decision-making are central to enabling UAV swarms to complete cooperative tasks without human intervention.

triples.name: Decentralized decision-making
triples.relevance: Collaborative decision-making algorithms in UAV swarms rely on distributed, decentralized decision-making approaches for efficient coordination.

triples.name: Adaptive collaborative control
triples.relevance: Collaborative control frameworks enable autonomous UAVs to coordinate and work together as partners in achieving cooperative task completion with improved efficiency and reliability.
